title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. G, ch. II, pt. 270 - Lands Underwater: Grants, Easements, Leases, Permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. G, ch. II, pt. 270 - Lands Underwater: Grants, Easements, Leases, Permits

§ 270.1 - Repealed
§ 270.2 to 270.3 - Repealed
§ 270.4 - Repealed

Subpart 270-2 - Definitions (§ 270-2.1)

Subpart 270-3 - General Prohibition; Application Factors (§ 270-3.1 to 270-3.3)

Subpart 270-4 - Application For A Grant In Fee Simple Of Land Underwater (§ 270-4.1 to 270-4.11)

Subpart 270-5 - Application For A Grant Of Easement, Lease, Permit, Lesser Interest In Lands Underwater (docks, Structures, Etc.) (§ 270-5.1 to 270-5.8)

Subpart 270-6 - Fees, Appraisal, Limitations (§ 270-6.1 to 270-6.8)

Subpart 270-7 - Statutory Thresholds: Exemptions (§ 270-7.1 to 270-7.4)

Subpart 270-8 - Cessions Of Jurisdiction (§ 270-8.1)

Subpart 270-9 - Transfers Of Jurisdiction (§ 270-9.1)

Subpart 270-10 - Enforcement Procedure (§ 270-10.1 to 270-10.9)

Notes

Statutory authority: Public Lands Law, §§10, 75

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
